00001 #include "BetterAuthorizationSampleLib.h"
00002 #include "CommandProcArguments.h"
00003 
00004 
00005 // ********************************
00006 // Constants for Each of your Tasks
00007 // ********************************
00008 
00009 // Descriptions of each task.
00010 
00011 // "SetAnyUserPrefs" sets some preferences for some bundle ID in /Library/Preferences.
00012 // "CopyFiles" copies an array of files to new paths.  Either the original files or
00013 //     the new files, and/or their parent directories, may require elevated privilges.
00014 // "SetPermissions" executes chmod(2) on a given path.
00015 
00016 // Declare a "command proc" (function) for each task.  (These are defined in the Helper Tool.)
00017 
00018 OSStatus DoSetAnyUserPrefs(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00019 OSStatus DoCopyFiles(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00020 OSStatus DoSetPermissions(COMMAND_PROC_ARGUMENTS) ;
00021 
00022 // Declare a "command name" for each task.
00023 
00024 #define kSetAnyUserPrefsCommand                         "SetAnyUserPrefs"
00025 #define kCopyFilesCommand                   "CopyFiles"
00026 #define kSetPermissionsCommand              "SetPermissions"
00027 
00028 // Declare a "right name" for each task.
00029 
00030 #define kSetAnyUserPrefsRightName       "com.sheepsystems.SetAnyUserPrefs"
00031 #define kCopyFilesRightName             "com.sheepsystems.CopyFiles"
00032 #define kSetPermissionsRightName    "com.sheepsystems.SetPermissions"
00033 
00034 // ***********************************************************
00035 // Optional Keys used to Pass Data to and from the Helper Tool
00036 // ***********************************************************
00037 
00038 /*
00039  These keys appear in the request and response dictionaries.
00040  You can re-use these in different tasks, or define your own as needed.
00041  These are defined without the "@" prefix so that they can be used in CFSTR()
00042  To use create NSStrings in Cocoa methods, add the "@" prefix.
00043  You may pass any ^serializable^ [1] CoreFoundation object
00044  (CFString, CFNumber, CFBoolean, CFDate, CFData, CFArray, and CFDictionary).
00045  If you wish to pass nonserializable objects you must archive them into a CFData.
00046  Wrapping nonserializable objects into a dictionary or array is not good enough.
00047  [1] http://developer.apple.com/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFPropertyLists/CFPropertyLists.html
00048 */ 
00049 #define kDictionaryPayload      "Payload"                       // CFDictionary of prefs to be set
00050 #define kInfos              "Infos"             // CFArray of information for commands 
00051 #define kSourcePath         "SourcePath"        // Source path in a CopyFiles Info dictionary
00052 #define kDestinPath         "DestinPath"        // Destin path in a CopyFiles Info dictionary
00053 #define kFailures           "Failures"          // CFDictionary of paths with failures
00054 #define kBundleIdentifier   "BundleIdentifier"  // string
